meanings.definition: Without a date or time specified.
meanings.sent1: The library had a dateless book on its shelves.
meanings.sent2: The event was dateless, causing confusion among the attendees.
meanings.sent3: The dateless invitation led to many guests arriving on the wrong day.
meanings.sent4: Her dateless schedule made it hard to plan any activities.
meanings.sent5: The dateless document had no indication of when it was created.

meanings.sent1: Their love was dateless, enduring through all challenges.
meanings.sent2: Legends speak of a dateless fountain that grants eternal youth.
meanings.sent3: The dateless flame burned brightly in the darkness.
meanings.sent4: The dateless bond between the two friends never wavered.
meanings.sent5: The dateless sky stretched endlessly above them.

meanings.sent1: The artist's work was considered dateless, appreciated by generations.
meanings.sent2: The beauty of the ancient ruins was truly dateless.
meanings.sent3: The dateless melody echoed through the halls of the old castle.
meanings.sent4: Her wisdom was as dateless as the mountains.
meanings.sent5: The dateless wisdom of the wise elder guided the village through many trials.
